metadata.title: CVE-2015-8364 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the ff_ivi_init_planes function in libavcodec/ivi.c inFFmpeg before 2.6.5, 2.7.x before 2.7.3, and 2.8.x through 2.8.2 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap-memoryaccess) or possibly have unspecified other impact via crafted imagedimensions in Indeo Video Interactive data.

criterions.comment: libav: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
